name: Party Games: Truth or Dare
description:
Truth or Dare is our SPIN (thank you) on a classic party game!

WHAT IS TRUTH OR DARE?
Truth or Dare uses a spinning wheel to decide your fate. Sit in a circle with your friends, choose someone to go first. That person is the dare master and must pick someone to be their victim. They must let their victim spin the wheel. Once it stops the daremaster must ask their victim either a deep dark truth or dare them to do something. Once the victim has completed their task or confessed all their darkest secrets, they become the daremaster and must pick another victim!

FEATURES
★ An exciting new way to decide your fate
★ Beautiful retina graphics for all your iOS devices
★ Play with any number of your friends
